favorites.author: Lucas Ropek
favorites.title: Nobody Can Rent Twister, the Last DVD Trapped in Redbox’s Dead Video Business
favorites.description: Hardware nerds just want to see Bill Paxton and Helen Hunt outrun a tornado. Why isn't that possible?
favorites.content: Though Redbox, the DVD vending machine company, is officially dead, the company’s disc-dispensing kiosks are still strewn all over America. The machines still work and there are still hundreds of DVD… [+2411 chars]

favorites.author: Tom Warren
favorites.title: Qualcomm cancels its miniature Windows on Arm PC
favorites.description: Qualcomm has canceled its Snapdragon Dev Kit hardware. The mini PC was supposed to usher in a wave of Windows on Arm apps.
favorites.content:
Qualcomm cancels its miniature Windows on Arm PC
Qualcomm cancels its miniature Windows on Arm PC
 / A simple HDMI port may have taken down a key Snapdragon dev kit.
